name: Despot - Z Series - Piramides Grande
additionalNotes: With roots in Serbia and handcrafted in the heart of Nicaragua, our cigars are the result of generations of passion for tobacco. The Despot family, a pioneer in the Serbian cigar scene, has carefully selected the best tobaccos in the world to create a unique and authentic smoking experience. Each Despot cigar is a tribute to craftsmanship and quality, offering a complex and balanced flavor profile that will delight the most demanding palates.
